content: Singaporean beauty pageant titleholder **Bernadette Belle Wu Ong** is a Singaporean actress, emcee, model, and beauty pageant titleholder who was appointed as [Miss Universe Singapore 2020](/wiki/Miss_Universe_Singapore). She represented Singapore at [Miss Universe 2020](/wiki/Miss_Universe_2020). ## Personal life Ong was born and raised in the [Philippines](/wiki/Philippines) to Chinese parents. Her family moved to [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) when she was 10 and later on, she studied in [Australia](/wiki/Australia). ## Pageantry Ong competed in the [Miss Universe Singapore](/wiki/Miss_Universe_Singapore) in 2019. She also won the title Miss Charm Singapore 2019 and later represented Singapore in Miss Charm International 2019. She was handpicked to compete at [Miss Universe 2020](/wiki/Miss_Universe_2020), which was delayed due to the [COVID-19 pandemic](/wiki/COVID-19_pandemic) and was held on 16 May 2021. - Official website Awards and achievementsPreceded byMohana Prabha **[Miss Universe Singapore](/wiki/Miss_Universe_Singapore)** (/wiki/Miss_Universe_Singapore)Succeeded by[Nandita Banna](/wiki/Nandita_Banna) This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Bernadette Ong
